data.title: Time Bandits Season 1: Here’s Episode 5 and 6 release date, upcoming episode schedule and where to watch
data.meta_description: Time Bandits Season 1 Episode 5 and 6 release on August 7, 2024, on Apple TV+. Episode 5 explores Georgian times, while Episode 6 involves a heist targeting the world's richest man.
data.text:
Synopsis

Time Bandits Season 1 Episode 5 and 6 release on August 7, 2024, on Apple TV+. Episode 5 explores Georgian times, while Episode 6 involves a heist targeting the world's richest man.

Time Bandits, a popular series, is releasing Episode 5 and 6 of Season 1 on Wednesday, August 7, 2024, on Apple TV+. These episodes will explore different historical periods.

Episode 5 and 6 Release Date

Episode 5 and 6 of Time Bandits Season 1 will be available on August 7, 2024, on Apple TV+. Episode 5 takes the characters to Georgian times, while Episode 6 involves a plan to steal from the world's richest man.

Also Read : Rounders 2: Is a sequel in the works? Matt Damon shares intriguing details

Upcoming Episode Schedule

Time Bandits follows a consistent release schedule for Season 1. Two new episodes are released every Wednesday until the season finale on August 21, 2024.

Episode 5: 'Georgian' – Premiering on August 7, 2024, this episode features the Bandits meeting Casanova and the Earl of Sandwich while searching for Kevin’s home. Penelope faces a duel.

Episode 6: 'Mansa Mansa' – Also premiering on August 7, 2024, the Bandits search the desert for a missing member and plot to rob the richest man in history. Widgit explores the mysteries of the Map.

Episode 7: 'TBC' – Releasing on August 14, 2024.

Episode 8: 'TBC' – Releasing on August 14, 2024.

Episode 9: 'TBC' – Releasing on August 21, 2024.

Episode 10: 'TBC' – Releasing on August 21, 2024.

Where to Watch

Time Bandits is available exclusively on Apple TV+. For those interested in the original 1981 movie, it can be streamed on Max.

FAQs

When do Episode 5 and 6 of Time Bandits release?

Episode 5 and 6 of Time Bandits release on Wednesday, August 7, 2024, on Apple TV+.

Where can I watch the original 1981 Time Bandits movie?

The original 1981 Time Bandits movie is available to stream on Max.
